name: Super HECKA
description:
You are a professional HECKA ! At least I hope so...
The job:  Decrypt secret "SeaShell Coin" keys written on empty boxes.

Over the last 48 hours there were over 13 million boxes shipped...
that's way too much and to make it even more strange the boxes all seem to be empty and worthless...
And that's the part where you come in.
It seems that you have the biggest and best English dictionary on your machine and the keys also seem to be encrypted with the English dictionary you have...
I hope you know what that means... Commands... help... opens this messagehowtoplay... opens game manuallist [name]
f/first/firstnames ... opens list of first names
a/adjectives ... opens list of adjectives
n/nouns ... opens list of nouns
v/verbs ... opens list of verbs

e.g.    " list a "submit [key]
key ... checks if th key is correct (win)

e.g.    " submit A[156]A[696]N[999] "seashells... opens your bank account

Note: There is no save file as of now...
